(1, 1).title: EmptyCave
(1, 1).description:
The darkness here is as oppressive as the silence. The best Jean can do is feel his way around. Each step
        seems to get him no further than the last. The air here is quite cold, sending shivers through Jean's body.

props.name: Milo the Traveling Curio Dealer
props.description: A spry, eccentric merchant with a patchwork coat and a twinkle in his eye. Milo claims to have traveled the world, collecting rare oddities and useful adventuring gear.
